SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts

Class Front

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Fronts.Front
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceFront
public abstract class Front extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing the front side of a card in the game.

Each front side contains: - frontAngles: An array of angles or resources required or present on the front side. - points: Points awarded when the card is placed. - covered: An array indicating which angles/resources are covered. - hidden: A boolean indicating if the front side is hidden.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Front

      public Front(Angles[] frontAngles, int points, boolean[] covered)
      Constructor for initializing a Front object with specified front angles, points, and covered status.
      Parameters:
      frontAngles - An array of Angles representing the angles or resources on the front side.
      points - The points awarded when the card with this front side is placed.
      covered - An array indicating which angles/resources are covered.

  • Method Details

    • checkRequiredResources

      public abstract boolean checkRequiredResources(int[] resources, Card played)
      Abstract method to check if the required resources for a card are available.
      Parameters:
      resources - An array of integers representing available resources.
      played - The card being played.
      Returns:
      true if the required resources are available; false otherwise.

    • updateScoredPoints

      public abstract int updateScoredPoints(int[] anglesCounter, int coveredAngles)
      Abstract method to update the scored points based on the placement of the card.
      Parameters:
      anglesCounter - An array containing counts of angles/resources.
      coveredAngles - The number of covered angles/resources.
      Returns:
      The updated points scored by placing the card.

      Retrieves the array indicating which angles/resources are covered.

      public abstract Angles[] getRequiredResources()
      Abstract method to get the required resources associated with the front side.
      Returns:
      An array of Angles representing required resources.

    • hideFrontAngles

      public void hideFrontAngles()
      Hides the front angles by setting all elements in the frontAngles array to Angles.EMPTY. Also sets the hidden flag to true.

    • getHidden

      public boolean getHidden()
      Checks if the front side is hidden.
      Returns:
      true if the front side is hidden; false otherwise.

    • setHidden

      public void setHidden(boolean hidden)
      Sets the hidden status of the front side.
      Parameters:
      hidden - true to hide the front side; false to reveal it.

    • setCovered

      public void setCovered(int index, boolean covered)
      Sets the covered status of an angle/resource at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the angle/resource.
      covered - true to mark the angle/resource as covered; false to mark it as uncovered.
